title: Job Vacancies at Nelson Courier Express
content:
Nelson Courier Express is a logistics company based in Lagos, Nigeria. They specialize in providing fast and reliable courier services for both individuals and businesses. With a focus on efficient delivery and customer satisfaction, they offer a range of shipping and delivery solutions tailored to meet various needs.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Office Assistant

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Office Assistant provides administrative and clerical support to ensure the smooth day-to-day operation of the office.
	The role involves handling paperwork, assisting staff, managing records, and maintaining an organized and professional office environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Answer and direct phone calls, emails, and visitors
	Maintain and organize office files, records, and documents
	Prepare letters, reports, and other office correspondence
	Assist with data entry and updating office databases
	Schedule meetings and manage calendars
	Handle incoming and outgoing mail and deliveries
	Order and manage office supplies
	Support staff with administrative tasks as needed
	Keep the office clean, organized, and well-arranged
	Perform photocopying, scanning, and filing duties.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Minimum of / OND / HND / Bachelor’s degree
	Proven experience as an office assistant or in a similar role is an advantage
	Basic computer skills (MS Word, Excel, email)
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to multitask and work with minimal supervision
	Good organizational and time-management skills
	Should be ready to resume immediately.


Application Closing Date: 20th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: nelsoncourierandtransport@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Customer Service Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Customer Service Officer is responsible for providing excellent customer support by responding to inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
	The role involves effective communication with customers and maintaining a positive company image at all times.


Key Responsibilities


	Attend to customer inquiries in person, by phone, email, or online platforms
	Provide accurate information about company products and services
	Resolve customer complaints professionally and promptly
	Record and update customer information in company systems
	Follow up with customers to ensure issues are resolved
	Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty
	Handle orders, returns, and customer requests
	Escalate complex issues to the appropriate department
	Maintain proper documentation of customer interactions.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Minimum of an OND / HND / Bachelor’s degree
	Proven experience in customer service or a related role is an advantage
	Good verbal and written communication skills
	Ability to remain calm and professional under pressure
	Basic computer knowledge (email, CRM systems, MS Office)
	Thy interested candidate should be ready to start work immediately.


Application Closing Date: 15th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: nelsoncourierexpress@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Logistics Coordinator

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Logistics Coordinator is responsible for planning, coordinating, and monitoring the movement of goods from suppliers to customers.
	This role ensures timely, cost-effective, and efficient transportation, storage, and delivery while maintaining accurate records and strong communication with internal teams, vendors, and clients.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate and monitor supply chain operations from origin to final destination
	Schedule and manage shipments, deliveries, and transportation routes
	Communicate with suppliers, transporters, warehouses, and customers
	Prepare and maintain logistics documentation (invoices, delivery notes, waybills, customs papers, etc.)
	Track shipments and resolve delays, damages, or delivery issues
	Ensure compliance with company policies, safety standards, and regulatory requirements
	Manage inventory levels and coordinate stock movement
	Negotiate with transport providers to achieve cost-effective solutions
	Generate reports on logistics performance, costs, and delivery timelines
	Support continuous improvement of logistics processes.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree or diploma in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or related field
	Proven experience as a Logistics Coordinator or similar role
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills
	Excellent communication and negotiation abilities
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word) and logistics software
	Good problem-solving and decision-making skills
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.


Application Closing Date: 15th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: nelsoncourierandtransport@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Content Manager Job at Renmoney




        
    

        
        Renmoney - We are a passionate team determined to challenge the status quo and make financial inclusion count for the millions of under-banked individuals and small business owners in Nigeria. We provide loans, savings, and fixed deposit solutions to our customers. Our vision is to be the most convenient lending company, delivering outstanding service experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	Renmoney is looking for a creative and highly skilled Content Manager who can craft compelling stories, develop strong campaign ideas, and produce high-quality content across multiple channels.
	This is a hands-on role for someone who enjoys writing, ideating, and collaborating to bring ideas to life.
	You will help shape how millions of Nigerians experience the Renmoney brand through clear, engaging, and customer-focused communication.


What You’ll Do
Content Creation & Storytelling:


	Write clear, engaging content for campaigns, social media, ads, website, scripts, and lifecycle communication.
	Convert financial and product information into simple, relatable, human stories.
	Generate fresh, creative campaign ideas that resonate with Nigerian audiences.


Cross-Channel Content Execution:


	Create and adapt content across digital platforms including social media, emails, push notifications, and web pages.
	Support performance marketing with strong, conversion-focused copy.
	Maintain consistency in tone, messaging, and brand voice.


Brand & Product Messaging:


	Translate product features across loans, savings, cards, and SME tools into compelling user benefits.
	Work with Brand, Growth, and Design teams to ensure accuracy and compliance.
	Strengthen Renmoney’s voice as a modern, customer-centric fintech brand.


Content Operations & Collaboration:


	Manage and maintain a content calendar.
	Provide clear briefs to designers and videographers.
	Review major content assets to ensure quality and alignment.
	Collaborate with influencers, UGC creators, and agencies when necessary.


Insights, Research & AI Tools:


	Use AI tools to speed up ideation, drafting, and optimisation.
	Track content performance and recommend improvements.
	Stay updated on cultural, fintech, and industry trends to inform content decisions.


Requirements
What You Bring:


	Minimum of 4 years of experience in content writing, copywriting, or marketing communications.
	Strong storytelling and campaign ideation skills.
	Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading ability.
	Experience creating content for digital channels.
	Ability to work cross-functionally in a fast-paced environment.
	Comfortable using AI tools to enhance productivity.
	Experience in fintech, banking, or consumer brands is an advantage.


Benefits
What’s In It For You:


	Opportunity to shape how millions of Nigerians engage with a fast-growing fintech brand.
	Hands-on ownership of high-impact content across brand, growth, and performance channels.
	Close collaboration with creative, product, and growth teams in a modern marketing environment.
	Room to experiment with storytelling, campaign ideas, and AI-powered workflows.
	A values-driven workplace that prioritises customers, integrity, collaboration, and excellence.

Accountant Job at BeyondTabs Pharmacy




        
    

        
        BeyondTabs Pharmacy is a retail pharmaceutical outlet located in the Lekki Peninsula II area of Lagos, Nigeria. It is described as a "wholesome experience" that combines health and beauty needs with a focus on knowledgeable, professional service.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	The Accountant wilI provides critical financial insight and analysis to support business decision-making and ensure the achievement of expense, headcount, and volumetric targets.
	This role ensures the accuracy and integrity of general ledger data, prepares financial performance reports, and partners closely with business leaders on budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning.
	This position is equivalent to a Senior Accountant level, with responsibility for complex accounting entries, advanced reconciliations, and higher-level financial analysis.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide timely and accurate financial analysis to support expense, headcount, and volume targets
	Monitor general ledger entries and processing streams to ensure data integrity and compliance
	Prepare, review, and analyses financial performance and management reports
	Post and review complex accounting entries and perform reconciliations of complex accounts
	Collaborate with department leaders on budgeting, forecasting, capital planning, and personnel planning
	Analyze Partner Expenditure reports and provide audit-ready documentation
	Support internal audits, external audits, and regulatory reviews
	Ensure accounting standards, policies, and ethical practices are consistently applied
	Act as a subject-matter resource on accounting guidelines, financial systems, and reporting tools


Skills & Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting with 1 - 3 years of work experience.
	Strong knowledge of GAAP and accounting principles
	Proven analytical and financial reporting skills
	Solid accounting experience, preferably in a corporate or multinational environment
	Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel
	Experience working with financial and ERP systems
	High attention to detail with strong problem-solving ability
	Ability to work with moderate supervision and manage multiple priorities.


Benefits


	Attractive salary plus other benefits.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: career@beyondtabs.com  and reachskofield@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Document Management Officer Job at Talent Sage Limited




        
    

        
        Talent Sage Limited - Our client in the real estate industry is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Document Management Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Assist in organizing and filing both physical and digital documents in an orderly and easy-to-access system.
	Help retrieve documents as needed by team members, ensuring quick and efficient access.
	Update and maintain an electronic document management system to ensure all records are accurate and up-to-date.
	Ensure that all company documents are properly categorized, archived, and stored.
	Help ensure that documents meet company policies and regulatory requirements.
	Assist in the safe destruction of outdated or unnecessary documents following company policies.


Qualification & Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Management, or a related field with 1-2 years of experience in document management or administration
	Basic knowledge of document management systems and organizational tools, proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, etc.).
	Familiarity with both physical and electronic filing systems.
	Ability to learn and use document management software quickly.
	High attention to detail and accuracy.
	Strong organizational and time-management skills.
	Good communication skills and ability to work within a team.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 / Month (Net) 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@talents-age.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
